column5: Hit the show today with my brother in law Was pretty good and at the very least got our juices flowing for the upcoming season Stopped by the Handlebarz booth and met Pete Very funny since I had just posted about watching him on Muaky Hunter.  Pete was great meeting you.  Thanks for the lure pick and the tips for musky in the Kawarthas Hope u get the call for more Saric trips.  Couldn't happen to a nicer guy Cheers Gordy aka Andrew
